Title: Authorizes the city of New York to establish a residential parking system in the postal designation and area of Queens village near the UBS arena
Summary: Authorizes the city of New York to establish a residential parking system in the postal designation and area of Queens village near the UBS arena.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a residential parking system in the postal designation and area of Queens village near the UBS arena
